name: Cribbage Square Collection
description:
CRIBBAGE SQUARE COLLECTION is an 12-in-1 collection of games related by the Cribbage Square solitaire theme.

Totally free!! No in-app purchases.

CRIBBAGE SQUARE: The classic Cribbage solitaire game where you place cards in a 5x5 grid and each row and each column is scored as a separate crib hand. cribbage Square can be played in three variants 3x3, 4x4 and 5x5.

CRIBBAGE PUSH: Choose with row/column to push the next card. Cards already in play will move accordingly. When the board is full it will score as in standard Cribbage Square.

CRIBBAGE DRAW - Starting with a full grid of cards you get four rounds of discards to make the best cribbage square you can.

CRIBBAGE CACHE: A variant of Cribbage square where you have 4 cache spots where you can keep cards for later play.

CRIBBAGE SPRAWL: A variant of Cribbage Square with a challenging constraint that cards can only be placed adjacent to a previously placed card. Cribbage Sprawl can be played in two variants, 4x4 and 5x5.

CRIBBAGE CHOICE: A variant of Cribbage Square where you can choose the next card to play from a set of five options.

GRAVITY CRIBBAGE: A variant of Cribbage Square with a challenging gravitational constraint. You choose into which column the next card will fall. Three wildcards are added to spice things up. Gravity Cribbage can be played in two variants, 4x4 and 5x5.

CRIBBAGE CONFLICT: A competitive variant of Cribbage Square where you take turns with an opponent placing cards on the board. You score the rows (horizontal) and your opponent scores the columns (vertical). You can play the computer or a friend using Pass-and-Play.

CRIBBAGE PILE: A variant of Cribbage Square where you can choose to place the next card or put it on a discard pile. The top card on the discard pile can be played at anytime revealing the card underneath.

CRIBBAGE CIRCLE: A truly unique bonus game where you place cards in a large circle. All connected 5-card hands will score.

CRIBBAGE DOMINOES: Place card dominoes on a 5x5 grid. Each row & each column scores as a standard cribbage hand.

CRIBBAGE HEXAGON: Place cards in a hexagonal grid trying to make the best hands on the verticals and the diagonals.
